title: Gemini 3 Pro Holistic XOH Review
description: Use Gemini 3 Pro (Gemini CLI) with 1M token context to review internal_docs, memory_bank, scripts, and vikunja_tasks; spawn agents as needed and assign Cline CLI tasks using kat-coder-pro or moonshotai/kimi-k-2.5. Produce a consolidation report, Vikunja task manifests, and PR recommendations.
